overview: Erez Yereslove brings a unique combination of creative thought-leading perspective and data-driven high-success marketing performance approach. He has extensive experience of strategic management and performance marketing expertise of top-brand companies in both the online and offline space. Most recently, Erez brought this approach to his work as the Sr. Director of Lifecycle Marketing at eHarmony Inc., to effectively manage the conversion, loyalty and retention efforts of eHarmony subscribers around the globe. Prior to that, in 2007 Erez served as the Director of Relationship Marketing at Fox Interactive Media, managing the research and retention efforts for MySpace, IGN, Rotten Tomatoes, Fox.com and other key online entities. Erez also held other management positions at The Walt Disney Company, working within the Corporate Brand Management, as a Consumer Insights Manager at NBC-Universal, as well a Research Associate at Brandeis University. Erez started his career at the Israeli Intelligence unit.
